original_title: Emerson, Lake & Palmer: The Old Grey Whistle Test 1973
overview: Bob Harris introduces film of Emerson Lake and Palmer's 1973 Euro concert tour. Behind the scenes antics include Greg Lake falling prey to laryngitis in Vienna, Keith Emerson destroying a keyboard and Carl Palmer rehearsing the 1812 overture.
title: Emerson, Lake & Palmer: The Old Grey Whistle Test 1973
